titles.title: Criminal Antitrust Anti-Retaliation Act of 2015
Criminal Antitrust Anti-Retaliation Act of 2015
Criminal Antitrust Anti-Retaliation Act of 2015
A bill to provide anti-retaliation protections for antitrust whistleblowers.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

calendar.text: Committee on the Judiciary. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

action.text: Committee on the Judiciary. Reported by Senator Grassley with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 151.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
